data.name: VR Photo Viewer
data.detailed_description:
A 360 degree panorama is one of the best ways to capture how a scene truly looks when you are there. VR Photo Viewer makes it easy to view these memories as they are meant to be.

  • Connect to your Google Photos account to see all supported photos in your collection
  • View files stored on your PC or connected devices
  • Supports 3D Stereoscopic photos like those taken with Cardboard Camera, Fujifilm FinePix REAL 3D, or Nintendo 3DS
  • Supports audio recorded by Cardboard Camera
  • Preview your photos on a small scale and select which one to view in full quality
  • Easily switch between photos with VR controller support

More features coming soon, provide your feedback to let us know what you'd like to see next!

data.short_description: View your Photosphere, Cardboard Camera, 360 degree panorama, and 3D stereoscopic photos in room scale virtual reality. Photos are loaded from your Google Photo collection or your local file system and displayed in full detail.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
